about_the_game:
"Fruit Zuma" is a classic and fun elimination game. The exquisite game pictures bring the enjoyment of the players' perspective. The cool skills are irresistible. The cheerful background music makes the players feel the relaxed atmosphere of the game. Come and try your eyesight and reaction.

How to play: click on the screen, the bow and arrow will shoot fruits of different colors, and connect with the fruits running along a track. Once three or more fruits are connected together, these fruits will disappear immediately, and after all the fruits disappear, the game will win;

Introduction: for some useless fruit, you can click the direction of no fruit, directly spit out of the screen.

Skills: there are 8 skills in the game: 1. Eliminate a fruit; 2. Aim at the auxiliary line; 3. Pause; 4. Lightning: destroy a fruit on a line; 5. Decelerate; 6. Retreat; 7. Clear a fruit on the screen; 8. Bomb: destroy in a large range
